ComicInfo.Summary:
Be There Now: Terry LaBan relates the influence Robert Crumb's work had on him, accompanied by some illustrations, and wonders what he will be doing in the future.
The Metamorphosis: A caterpillar forms a chrysalis.
Supercat: Eno and Plum's cat has super powers.
Mickey Pimple, Teen Adventurer: Mickey and Hanson become involved in the Serpent Woman's nefarious plans.
Mall Crawl: Eno is overcome with consumer frenzy.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-11 20:52:16. [CVDB135125] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 08:12:09. [Issue ID 240174]
ComicInfo.Characters: Barney The Dog,Eno,Plum's Cat,Plum,Mickey Pimple,Terry LaBan
